While both Foil and FoW can both be free counters, Foil costs only 2UU, makes it easier to use should you have the spare mana to cast it outright. Couple with other cards such as Daze and Obsessive Research or threshold mechanic, the drawback could be lessened or even utilized compare to FoW.

FoW is no doubt still more powerful.

@Channelblaze: I wonder if your idea of pitching Circular Logic could be used on cards with Cascade?

posts.post_content:
Foil and Daze are sort of synergistic.  
  
There's got to be some potential use for this in a [Life from the Loam](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Life from the Loam) deck, discarding an Island and another land -- Loam would make obtaining and recovering discarded lands easy, and Tropical Islands or whatever would help pay for [Intuition](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Intuition) and transmuting [Tolaria West](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tolaria West). It'd be hard to recover the Foil if it was dredged into the graveyard, though...
